snippet: The commemoration of the bombing of the United Nations Baghdad offices was overshadowed by staff members who said internal labor practices had compromised their safety and security.
abstract: Commemoration of 10th anniversary of the bombing of the United Nations Baghdad offices is overshadowed by aggrieved UN staff members, whose union representatives presented Secretary General Ban Ki-moon's office with letter asserting that his internal labor policies have compromised their safety and security.
lead_paragraph: The commemoration of the bombing of the United Nations Baghdad offices was overshadowed by staff members who said internal labor practices had compromised their safety and security.

headline.main: At U.N., Labor Tensions Mar 10th Anniversary of Bombing
headline.print_headline: At U.N., Labor Tensions Mar 10th Anniversary of Bombing
